name: Scotty's Little Soldiers Playing Cards
description:
These special limited edition Scotty's Little Soldiers playing cards are a unique set, so hurry whilst stocks last.

52 cards in a pack plus 3 jokers.

A perfect stocking filler.

name: Scotty's Little Soldiers Snap Cards
description:
These 'Scotty's Snap cards' are a limited edition so grab them quick.

A great game for all the family.  The children will have so much fun matching the 9 different glossy Scotty character designs. 

36 Cards in a pack.

A perfect stocking filler.

description:
Why not treat yourself to our brand new Scotty's Little Soldiers t-shirts available in black or white.  They have the Scotty's Little Soldiers logo on the front and Scotty character on the back.   Machine wash warm, inside out and please do not tumble dry.

S: 38"

description:
XS: 36/38 
S: 40 
M: 42/44 
L: 46/48 
XL: 50

The Scotty's little soldiers hoodies are generously sized and really warm and cosy, perfect for the winter months. 
(For ladies, we would suggest ordering a size smaller than you normally would.) 
They are a unisex style made from 50% cotton and 50% polyester. Machine wash at 40 degrees but please do not tumble dry.

name: Scotty Golf Umbrella
description:
LIMITED EDITION.

The great new Scotty umbrella has arrived!

The Black and yellow umbrella bears the Scotty's Little Soldiers name and is a great way to show your support to the children of the fallen when out and about in the showers or sunshine!

Length closed - 100cm
Diameter open - 130cm

Don't miss out, get yours now whilst stocks last.

name: Scotty Cufflinks
description:
Now you can show your support for Scotty's at the most formal of events.  These Scotty character cufflinks are available for a limited time only so order fast to avoid missing out.

Will look great for all the gents attending the Scotty ball this year!


All the profits from Scotty's Little Shop go towards covering the running costs of the charity.

description:
Our smart looking pin badges are the perfect way to raise awareness for Scotty's everyday.

Remember all sales of Scotty Gear help to cover the charities running costs.

description:

description:
Our new Scotty backpacks are perfect for school.  They include a large main area and a smaller front zip space.  There's also a mesh side pocket and a Scotty character zip.

A great way to support Scotty's at school, work or the gym!
